meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Motion for Chair to preside over the Special Called Meeting.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 5 through 6
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the January 16, 2025 special called joint meeting.
agenda_items.description: Presenter: Tamara L. Leak, Assistant Director (I), Office of Economic Development. Board(s): Downtown Connection TIF District and DDDA.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider an amendment of the Downtown Connection TIF District Project Plan.
agenda_items.description: To add a provision for a directed sale of an approximately 1.09 acre property and reprogram $6,980,602 2006 NPV dollars to support the relocation and development of a new Fire Station No. 18.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and Forward a Recommendation of Approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a development agreement with Tango North RF, LLC.
agenda_items.description: In an amount not to exceed $29,399,487 for the Fire Station No. 18 Relocation Project.
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and Forward a Recommendation of Approval to the City Council

financial_items.description: Reprogramming of funds from Redevelopment of Vacant/Underutilized Downtown Buildings to support Fire Station No. 18.
Development agreement amount for Fire Station No. 18 Relocation Project.
